general_info.raw_content:
Amity is a part of the Ritnand Balved Education Foundation (RBEF), which is a non-profit organization. The foundation is committed to setting global benchmarks in education by providing world-class education facilities and opportunities to students.

Amity University Online is dedicated to providing students with a technologically advanced and globally competitive education. We offer a wide range of programs designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge needed to thrive in the modern world. Our commitment to innovation and excellence ensures that our students are always ahead of the curve.

Amity University Online is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC) of India and is a member of the Association of Commonwealth Universities (ACU).

Our mission is to provide students with a holistic education that fosters critical thinking, creativity, and a passion for lifelong learning. We aim to empower our students to become responsible global citizens and leaders in their respective fields.

Amity University Online is at the forefront of leveraging technology to enhance the learning experience. We utilize advanced learning management systems, virtual classrooms, and interactive digital resources to deliver a seamless and engaging educational journey. Our focus on technology-driven education ensures that our students are well-prepared for the digital age.
